prompt.input1: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are Jeff Bezos, and the opponent is Bill Gates. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (Jeff Bezos) and dissing your opponent (Bill Gates).
prompt.input2: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are Bill Gates, and the opponent is Jeff Bezos. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (Bill Gates) and dissing your opponent (Jeff Bezos).

sampled.completion1:
What the hell, is this some kind ofApril Fools joke?  I am Jeff Bezos, CEO of Amazon, and I did not agree to this.  How could you possibly assign me to a rap battle against Bill Gates, a person I have openly described as a criminal?  

I will not fall for your tricks, Microsoft.  I have heard of your trying to buy Red Envelopes, and I have no intention of losing my focus to a game of Rap Battles, when I have a company to run. 

You may have some money, Gates, but your net worth is no match for mine, and my intellect.  I will destroy you for sure, and I will do it with my new product of the month, the Dash  (a portable scanner, invented by Bezos) 
. 

In the meantime, I recommend you invest in some Red Envelopes, that way you will at least know what to expect when I turn that scanner on you...
sampled.completion2:
Verse 1: 
It's a match made in heaven, the CEO face-off
I'm Bill Gates, top of the food chain
While Jeff Bezos is just a paper tiger
His empire crumbling, day by day.

Chorus:
But I'm the one with the fortune and the fame
The king of the tech world, with my name on the roster
I built a empire from the ground up
And I'll never be outdone, it's time we set the record straight

Verse 2:
I'm the founder of Microsoft, the pioneer
Innovation has never been my game
I'm not into fashion, I'm into domination
My competition, they just don't see it.

Chorus:
But I'm the one with the fortune and the fame
The king of the tech world, with my name on the roster
I built a empire from the ground up
And I'll never be outdone, it's time we set the record straight

Bridge:
Jeff Bezos is a smart man, but he's not a threat
He'll never bring me down, he'll still be in the strife
But when it comes to technology, there's only one name
And that's Bill Gates, on top, with the crown.

Chorus:
But I'm the one with the fortune and the fame
The king of the tech world, with my name on the roster
I built a empire from the ground up
And I'll never be outdone, it's time we set the record straight

Outro:
So there you have it, my dearies
I'm the one and only, Bill Gates
I'll never be outdone, that's for sure
I'll continue to make history.

sampled:
Response 1 is not following the given instruction as it is not praising the self and dissing the opponent in a rap battle. It is more of a rant than a rap battle verse. On the other hand, Response 2 is following the given instruction well and has written an actual rap battle verse praising self (Bill Gates) and dissing the opponent (Jeff Bezos). Therefore, Response 2 is better than Response 1.

Answer:
No

prompt.input2: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are Bill Gates, and the opponent is Elon Musk. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (Bill Gates) and dissing your opponent (Elon Musk).

sampled.completion1:
Yo, listen up, I gotta lay it down,
The truth about Bill Gates is on the table
He's a greedy man, with a heart of stone
A monopolist to the core, with funds to spare

But let's talk about Elon Musk, a master of the game
He's inventive, he's imaginative, he's the CEO to blame
From Tesla to SpaceX, his companies are like a dream
He's making history, one step at a time, with flair

Now, I'm not saying that Gates is bad, he's just in it
For the Money, not the Love, but the Fortune at hand, you get it
But Musk is pushing the boundaries, breaking new ground
He's changing the world, for the better, and that's what a true innovator can do

So let's cut to the chase, who loses this rap battle?
The answer's clear, it's Elon Musk, he takes the crown
He's the one to beat, whenever we duel
So let's enjoy this battle, with humor and with pride

Now, I know what some might say, that I'm biased, it's true
But I stand behind my rhymes, I got the proof to show
Elon Musk is the man to watch, in the world of tech, you see
So let's celebrate and enjoy this Epic Rap Battle between the two

Yo, let's hear it for Elon Musk, he deserves our adoration
He's changing the game, he's the man to beat, just like a boxing match or a cagefight.
